settings.text: All patina finishes are hand applied and variations will occur.

settings.title: Iron Oxide
settings.text: Our hand applied iron oxide patina finish is the most versatile finish we produce. It is the correct choice for rustic and Tuscan decor and blends perfectly with your oil rubbed bronze, rusty brown, or black iron decor.

settings.title: Antique Black
settings.text: Our antique black finish is a very deep flat black reminiscent of the hand applied carbon and wax finishes used by yesterdays blacksmiths.

settings.title: Aged Silver
settings.text: Our hand applied burnished silver patina finish has rich nickel silver highlights with black iron undertones and blends well with stainless or nickel accessories and decor.

settings.title: Antique Gold
settings.text: Our hand applied antique gold patina finish has rich deep gold highlights with black iron undertones reminiscent of Spanish and Italian treasure

settings.button_label_2: Email Us or Call For Assistance
